Al Khoory Hotel Apartments Al Barsha  (Formerly knows as Coral Al Khoory Hotel Apartments) is positioned in Al Barsha district - Dubai, close to Ski Dubai. Its large, well-equipped serviced suites offer comfort and style.

Each of the suites at Al Khoory Hotel Apartments Al Barsha features a designer bathroom and modern kitchen facilities.

Guests can relax in the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool or make use of the gym facilities and sauna.  Guests can also enjoy a tasty snack or beverage in the hotel’s restaurant.

Al Khoory Hotel Apartments Al Barsha is just a 10-minute walk away from the famous Mall of the Emirates.  A short drive away you will find Internet City, Media City and Knowledge Village.

sign in
.


Located on Dubai’s Palm Jumeirah Island and enjoys a private sandy beach, the 5-star Atlantis offers stunning views of the Arabian Gulf. It provides an underwater aquarium and complimentary access to the Aquaventure water park and the Lost Chambers Aquarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property.

All the Arabian and oceanic décor inspired rooms feature a balcony with scenic views. They include a flat-screen satellite TV, a seating area, complimentary tea/coffee making facilities and a mini bar. Some rooms include a stunning large terrace with panoramic views of the palm or an over sized spa bath located in the center of the bathroom.

Dining options include Hakkasan, which serves Authentic Cantonese cuisine in a modern setting. The award-winning Nobu restaurant serves contemporary Japanese cuisine with Arabian influences. Bread Street Kitchen Bar offers signature British menu and delightful beverages from Gordon Ramsay. Guests can enjoy stunning views of The Palm and Dubai skyline while savoring the tastes of authentic Lebanese cuisine along with delicious beverages at Ayamna

Guests enjoy complimentary access to Aquaventure, the largest waterpark in the Middle East, features the Tower of Neptune and the Tower of Poseidon packed with thrilling water slides. A water playground for younger guests is available. The Kids Club provides the best fully supervised entertainment for your children and with daily programs. The Zone offers teens a chance to hangout, dance and play the latest video games. Wavehouse offers both dining and entertainment in one area where guests can enjoy good food and drinks, a play area for children and adults, a four lane bowling alley, a state of the art wave machine and more. Guests can enjoy facial and body treatments at the Awaken Spa. The gym provides personal fitness coaches.

The property offers a range of some of the world’s finest high end boutiques and shops that cater for all of your holiday essentials. Guests have the opportunity to book a helicopter ride for a 15 minute tour around Dubai or for Airport transportation. Mall of the Emirates can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The Emirates Golf Club is 3 km away. The iconic Burj Khalifa and The Dubai Mall are a 25-minute drive from the Atlantis.
column3: Palm Jumeirah, Palm Jumeirah, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

Featuring a rooftop fitness centre and a temperature controlled outdoor pool, this 4-star hotel is located on Al Rigga Road in the centre of Deira. The hotel is only a 2-minute walk from Al Riqqa Metro Station.

Rooms at the  Excelsior Hotel Downtown have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They include modern furnishings and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a bathrobe. Some rooms feature large windows with panoramic city views.

The hotel includes Restaurant, Café and a lounge. The Lobby Café serves pastries and freshly-brewed Arabic coffee.

Guests can relax on a sun lounger poolside, or visit the steam room. Also, they can enjoy the Spa & massage treatments available in the Holiday Spa. The hotel is located around various shopping malls such as Al Ghurrair Mall, City Center Mall and Hamarain Shopping Center

Excelsior Hotel Downtown is only a 10-minute drive from Dubai International Airport and the Dubai International Convention Centre.  It has a 24-hour front desk and free on-site private parking.

Situated in the historical commercial centre of Deira Dubai, the City Seasons Hotel is a 5 min walk from the Metro Station Deira and the Deira City Centre Mall. It features an outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace and offers air-conditioned guestrooms.

Spacious City Seasons rooms are decorated in neutral colours and have modern wood furnishings. They feature floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic city views and include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The New Season restaurant serves international dishes and Arabic cuisine on a shaded outdoor terrace.

Dubai guests can relax in the hot tub, or visit the rooftop health club that includes massage facilities and a fully equipped gym. Free WiFi is available in public areas.

City Seasons Hotel Dubai is a 10-minute drive from Dubai International Airport and a 5-minute walk from the famous City Centre Shopping Mall. It offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking.

Le Meridien rooms are air-conditioned. Each room offers free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. They all offer views of the Arabian Gulf or Dubai's skyline.

Leisure facilities at the Mina Seyahi include a water sports centre and Club Mina fitness centre. Younger guests can enjoy Le Meridien Family Kids Club which offers activities programs, beach games as well as 2 separate kids’ pools. Guest of all ages can also enjoy Jungle Bay waterpark, complete with slides, a wave pool and other amenities.

Guests can enjoy a range of international dishes. Horizon offers snacks and cocktails by the pool. For more upbeat evening, Barasti Bar has live entertainment.

"Summer lovin', had me a blast" - the perfect start to your summer adventure in Dubai! If you're looking for the best hotel to book on Booking.com, look no further than ibis World Trade Centre.

Located just 5 minutes away from the Dubai Metro, ibis World Trade Centre is the perfect base for exploring all the city has to offer. And there's plenty to see - from the Museum of the Future to the stunning La Mer beachfront, the traditional Gold & Spice Souk, the iconic Dubai Frame, the world-renowned Burj Khalifa, and the unbeatable shopping experience of the Dubai Mall. You can also plan your outdoor fun happenings such as desert safari and water activities with our onsite travel desk.

Plus, when you book your stay at ibis World Trade Centre, you'll get free access to the pool at the neighboring Novotel World Trade Centre - the perfect way to cool off after a day of sightseeing.
Don't let this summer pass you by without experiencing all the wonders of Dubai. Book your stay at ibis World Trade Centre today on Booking.com!

bis Dubai Deira City Centre offers stylish accommodation in the Port Saeed Business district of Dubai. Located in front of the City Centre Deira Mall, it features free on-site parking and free public Wi-Fi.

The luxurious rooms and suites at the Grand Hyatt Dubai are decorated with traditional Arabic touches. They feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi and a minibar. The luxury marble bathroom includes spa tub, bathrobes and exclusive toiletries. Room service is available 24/7.

Guests can choose from Indian, Japanese and Singaporean food amongst the Grand Hyatt’s restaurants. Guests can dine on one of the terraces overlooking the resort grounds. The open kitchens allow diners to see the chefs in action.

Grand Hyatt Dubai’s Megaplex is the ultimate casual amusement hub for families and friends. column1: Staybridge Suites Dubai Financial Centre, an IHG Hotel
column2:
Staybridge Suites Dubai Financial Centre is located on Sheikh Zayed Road opposite the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC) & Dubai World Trade & Exhibition Centre and in close proximity to The Dubai Mall and the world’s tallest building, Burj Khalifa.

The countless leisure, dining, shopping, and entertainment attractions of Downtown, City Walk, La Mer, and Jumeirah Beach are a short drive away or can be easily reached via the Financial Centre metro station located right outside our doorstep. The 48-story tower sets an eye-catching feature to Dubai’s iconic skyline.

Guests have an option between one, two, or three-bedroom suites and studios that blend contemporary design with spacious layouts. Many of our suites enjoy spectacular views of the city or the sea. Every unit features its own fully-equipped kitchen and interconnecting suites offer greater flexibility for families or small groups travelling together.

The Dubai Financial Centre metro station is right in front of the hotel which provides easy transportation access to different destinations in the city.
column3: Sheikh Zayed Road, Trade Centre, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

column1: La Quinta by Wyndham Dubai Jumeirah
column2:

La Quinta by Wyndham Jumeirah is located in Jumeirah, just 10 minutes' drive from the World Trade Centre and Jumeirah Beach. The hotel has a rooftop pool ,2 restaurants and a bar.

La Quinta by Wyndham Jumeirah offers spacious rooms with seating area, and a marble bathroom with luxury bath amenities. They also have a minibar, coffee-and-tea-making facilities and free WiFi access.

Modern restaurants, including 24h Coffee Shop, an Indian Bistro Night Clubs are offering great food, cool beverage and entertainment options.

The gym and outdoor pool area with its sauna, steam room and hotel spa offer a relaxing setting for a peaceful afternoon. Children can enjoy themselves in the children’s pool.

Dubai International Airport is only 6 km away.
column3: Near Mina Rashid Port - Sheikh Rashid Rd - Al Raffa - Dubai - United Arab Emirates, Bur Dubai, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

J5 Hotels Port Saeed offers luxury and great facilities right in the heart of Dubai. The hotel is 3 km from Dubai International Airport and 10 km from the World Trade Center. Deira City Centre Metro Station is a short walk away.

Near the Deira City Center Shopping Mall, this is a great place for discovering the delights of modern Dubai, while also having easy access to the traditional souks.

Relax in the 24-hour lobby restaurant where you can enjoy a wide variety of non-alcoholic drinks, tea, coffee and light dishes. The J5 Cafe offers an extensive buffet for breakfast and a varied a la carte menu for lunch and dinner. The hotel’s bar has a variety of draft beers, cocktails and house wines.

The hotel has a long list of facilities and services such as limousine rental, a gym, an outdoor swimming pool, and fully equipped meeting rooms with the latest audiovisual equipment.

The hotel has its own parking facilities, free of charge, in a secured garage. It is 25 km from Sharjah International Airport. The Dubai Creek and Golf club, and Deira City Centre are within walking distance.

J5 RIMAL Hotel Apartments is situated in the centre of Dubai less than a 30-minute ride from the Dubai International Airport. It offers spacious air-conditioned studios and suites with modern kitchenettes.

The 24-hour J5 Café is situated in the glass facade of the lobby, serving snacks and drinks throughout the day. Rich breakfast buffet can be enjoyed each morning, with à la carte menus available for lunch and dinner.

Each unit at the J5 RIMAL Hotel Apartments has satellite TV. The kitchenette includes a 2-ringed electric cooker, tea and coffee making facilities and a minibar.

Guests of the hotel can dip in the rooftop pool or visit the Fitness and Wellness Centre. There is a pool bar that serves light snacks and beverages by the poolside.

J5 RIMAL Hotel Apartments is located 7 km from the Dubai World Trade Centre and 270 metres from the Al Rigga Metro Station. The commercial centre of Al Rigga is less than a 5-minute walk away.

The hotel has private on-site parking and offers an airport transfer shuttle on request.

column1: Fujairah Rotana Resort & Spa - Al Aqah Beach
column2:
Nestled between the Hajar Mountains and the Indian Ocean, this beachside resort offers luxury spa treatments and floodlit sports courts. The non-smoking rooms have a balcony with panoramic views.

All rooms feature a renovated interior and are fitted with either a balcony or terrace overlooking the ocean or garden. Each one has deluxe bedding, a well-stocked minibar and complimentary tea and coffee facilities.

At Fujairah Rotana Resort, guests can relax on the private beach or go for a refreshing swim in the temperature-controlled swimming pool.

Younger guests at Fujairah Rotana can make use of the hotel’s club for kids. There is also a separate children’s pool.

Mozaique serves a variety of international dishes and also includes regular themed dinner nights. Well-known cocktails, a variety of beers and Cuban cigars are available at Bar Muda.
column3: Dibba Al Aqah Beach, Al Aqah, United Arab Emirates

column2:
Situated in the heart of Dubai, the Ascot Hotel offers deluxe rooms with picturesque views of the city. It is a 5-minute drive from the popular Burjuman Mall.

The rooms are well-appointed, modernly furnished and have luxurious marble bathrooms. In-room amenities include large LCD TVs with satellite channels and a minibar.

The Ascot Hotel offers a choice of 3 food and beverage outlets. Chinese cuisine can be sampled at Shanghai Kitchen,  and Thai delicacies are offered at The Thai Connection. The hotel also has an Irish pub, Waxy O'Connors.

Guests of the Ascot Hotel are free to use the leisure facilities of the sister hotel next door.

The Ascot Hotel is a 7-minute drive from Sheikh Zayed Road.
column3: Khalid Bin Walid Road, Bur Dubai, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

column2:
The luxurious Beach Rotana is located in central Abu Dhabi with direct access to a private beach. The hotel boasts 12 restaurants and links directly to the Abu Dhabi Mall.

The Beach Rotana hotel features spacious and elegantly decorated rooms and suites. Some rooms have balconies with sea views. Fully-appointed apartments and suites are located adjacent to the hotel.

Guests can choose from a broad variety of continental, Asian and Arab cuisines. Beverages can be enjoyed at the Lounge or Pool Bar.

The hotel has its own tennis and squash courts. Around the pool there is a sundeck with loungers amid palm trees. Guests can use the spa facility or enjoy a massage and steam bath. There is also a Printspot mobile printing service.

Beach Rotana - Abu Dhabi is located in Al Zahiyah Area (Tourist Club Area) of Abu Dhabi, only a 5-minute drive from the Gold Souk. The underground car park is free of charge and the reception desk is open 24/7.

Situated in the centre of Al Ain, this Rotana overlooks a green park. It features a large outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace and offers elegant accommodations with furnished balconies and mountain views.

 Al Ain Rotana - Al Ain offers suites, rooms, poolside chalets and villas. All room types have air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms have flat-screen TVs and fully equipped kitchenettes.

The hotel offers all-day dining options as well as Lebanese and French restaurants with belly dancing and live music.  For cocktails and snacks, there is the Atrium Café, the Moodz bar and the poolside Aquarius.

Bodylines Leisure and Fitness Club has a fitness centre with cardiovascular and weight training facilities, as well as, massage rooms and squash courts. Yoga and kick boxing classes are also available.

Al Ain Rotana - Al Ain is located 3.4 km from the Al Ain Mall and is less than 2 km from the Palace Museum. It offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking. Car washing facilities are also available.

column1: Al Rawda Arjaan by Rotana, Abu Dhabi

The rooms at the Al Rawda Arjaan by Rotana, Abu Dhabi have an elegant décor with warm colours. Most of the rooms include a kitchenette and a seating area with satellite TV.

The Al Dar restaurant offers buffet meals and a menu with a selection of continental cuisine.

Bodylines, the Fitness Centre is located on the first floor. Other services offered by the hotel include laundry and dry cleaning facilities, a safety deposit box, and a valet parking service.

Abu Dhabi International Airport is a 20-minute drive away while ADNEC Exhibition Center is a 15-minute drive away. The Al Wahda Mall is located next door. The nearest bus stop is 500 metres away. Free valet parking is available on site.

Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental Abu Dhabi is 25-minutes’ drive from Abu Dhabi International Airport and the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre. column1: The Ritz-Carlton Ras Al Khaimah, Al Wadi Desert
column2:
Within the sanctuary of a protected nature reserve, The Ritz-Carlton Ras Al Khaimah, Al Wadi Desert is a unique remote getaway just 45 minutes from Dubai. Ideal for families and travelers seeking a remote getaway, the private resort offers adventure and tranquility combined in a tranquil desert oasis. Intimate pool villas, world-class destination dining, an award-winning hydrotherapy spa and an extensive range of family-friendly and outdoor activities add a luxurious touch to a traditional desert experience. Desert explorers and affluent travelers alike appreciate the beautiful surroundings and immersion in the traditional Bedouin lifestyle while still enjoying creature comforts.

Each one of the 100 villas feature a private pool and deck terrace complete with sun loungers, spacious bedroom and cozy seating area, fully-stocked mini bar and tea/coffee maker, spacious bathroom with luxury Asprey® amenities, complimentary WiFi and LCD TV.

An award-winning well-being experience awaits at Ritz-Carlton Al Wadi Desert, featuring the region’s only Rainforest circuit and a range of tailor-made treatments for a journey complementing serenity and tranquility. Complimentary fitness club is available for guests and visitors.

3 restaurants and 1 rooftop lounge highlight the best of local and international cuisine in a stylish environment. From a private dinner on the dunes under the starry sky or at the top of an ancient watchtower, to international and Indian cuisine at Kaheela, Moroccan cuisine at Moorish or signature steakhouse Farmhouse, The Ritz-Carlton Ras Al Khaimah, Al Wadi Desert enlivens the senses.

Connecting nature and culture is the pinnacle of the 500 hectares nature reserve. Guests at the resort can enjoy a daily falconry show, nature walks, archery, and other family-friendly outdoor activities including horse-riding, and encounters with Arabian Oryx, sand and Arabian gazelles, camels, horses, among the wildlife. Kids are entertained at the Ritz Kids Club, featuring an outdoor playground, an expert team at hand, and daily activities such as archery, pony riding, and initiation to nature, owl interaction and nature walks.

The fully furnished suites include air conditioning, a kitchen, spacious seating areas, and satellite TV with daily cleaning.

Guests can make use of the indoor swimming pool. Breakfast buffet as well as  Indian and Chinese cuisine are served for lunch and dinner at the Basma’s restaurant.

Basma Residence  is nearby attractions such as the Abu Shagara park, Jazeerah Park, the Corniche, and Sharjah’s business district.
column3: Abu Shagarah, Sharjah, United Arab Emirates

column2:
This hotel is located in Deira only 200 metres from the Union Metro Station and 8 km from Dubai International Airport. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with satellite TV. Dubai World Trade Centre is a short distance away by metro.

Rooms at the Panorama Deira Hotel have city views and simple furnishings. They are equipped with a small seating area, a minibar, and a private bathroom. Room service is available 24/7.

The Panoramic Café serves a continental breakfast, as well as local and international cuisine. At the Booze Bar guests can watch sports on the large-screen TV and enjoy a wide variety of drinks and light snacks.

The hotel has a tour desk that assists with car hire and offers information on local attractions. Nearby leisure activities include sand surfing and camel riding.

The Panorama Hotel Deira is a 5-minute walk from the Al Ghurair Shopping Centre and is only 2 km from the nearest beach. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service.
column3: Omar Bin Al-Khattab Road, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

Oasis Deira Hotel is located just 15 minutes’ drive from Dubai International Airport. It has a 24-hour front desk and airport shuttle. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with private bathrooms.

The cosy rooms at Oasis Deira Hotel are soundproofed. Room service is available 24 hours a day.

Oasis Deira Hotel is situated within walking distance to the Dubai Gold Souk and Dubai Creek.
column3: Sabkha Street, DUBAI Dubai, United Arab Emirates

column2:
Rainbow Hotel Apartments is situated in central Abu Dhabi on the exclusive Sheikh Hamdan Street. It is 30 minutes’ drive from Abu Dhabi International Airport. Many rooms offer self-catering facilities.

All rooms, studios and suites at the Rainbow Apartments have air conditioning and private bathrooms. Many are fitted with a small kitchenette with a refrigerator and microwave.

Rainbow Hotel has a 24-hour front desk. Fax and photocopying services are also available.

The Rainbow Hotel is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the Abu Dhabi Corniche.
column3: Hamdan Street, Behind Gift Collection Stores, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

column2:

sign in
.


XVA Art hotel is situated within the heart of historic Al Bastakiya. It offers elegant rooms featuring art by well-established designers and artists from the region, including Zayan Ghandour and Numa. Free WiFi is available.

All rooms at XVA Art are individually decorated. All rooms include air conditioning, a private bathroom, and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms have views of the surrounding wind-towers and minarets.

XVA’s store offers local artwork, handicrafts, handmade handbags and jewellery. Guests can enjoy the work of several international artists in XVA’s art gallery.

The central courtyard’s award-winning café serves vegetarian gourmet cuisine, made with fresh regional ingredients. The café also offers an array of fresh fruit juices and light refreshments.

Dubai International Airport is 20 minutes away by car. It is only a 5-minute walk from the Dubai Museum. The Gold Souk and Abra are 10 minutes' walk away.
column3: Al Fahidi Bastakiya, Bur Dubai, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

.


Centrally located in Abu Dhabi, Phoenix Plaza Hotel offers self-catering accommodation with full kitchens. Al Wahda Mall is a 10-minute walk and Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre is 10 minutes by car.

All studios and suites at Phoenix Plaza feature bright décor, washing machine and a satellite flat-screen TV. The en suite bathrooms include a bathrobe, slippers and free bathroom amenities.

Guests can use the apart-hotel’s modern gym or schedule a Thai massage.  The on-site coffee shop serves a daily breakfast, sandwiches and a selection of fresh fruit juice.  Room service is also available.

Staff at the hotel’s tour desk can arrange desert safaris or a cruise by traditional Dhow on the Arabian Gulf. Car and bicycle rentals are also offered by the Phoenix Plaza Hotel Apartments.

Many of Abu Dhabi’s shops and restaurants can be reached with a 10-minute walk from the hotel.  Abu Dhabi International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.
column3: Old Airport Road, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

This hotel in Al Barsha, Dubai is located next to the Mall of the Emirates and offers views of Burj Al Arab and Madinat Jumeirah. Free private parking is available upon reservation.

The suites and apartments at the Auris Boutique Hotel Apartments - AlBarsha have satellite TV, air conditioning and a kitchen with a microwave and refrigerator. Each apartment features a spacious seating area.

Relaxation options at the Auris Boutique include an outdoor swimming pool. Guests can also stay fit at the well-equipped gym. Light snacks and refreshments are available throughout the day at Hotspot Café (Coffee Shop).

Mashreq Metro Station is within 450 meters.
column3: Near Mall of the Emirates facing Sheikh Zyed Road, PO Box 113139, Al Barsha, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

column2:
This design hotel in the heart of Ajman’s business district offers spacious rooms with a modern design. All rooms have free wired internet and a satellite TV.

Kitchen facilities include a refrigerator and a microwave. Some of Dream Palace Hotel’s rooms come with a seating area and a balcony with views of the city.

Saudi Ajman Mosque is a 5-minute walk away while the hotel is a 5-minute drive from Ajman Cultural Centre.

Dream Palace Hotel offers an airport shuttle service. Guests can benefit from the 24-hour reception desk.

Sharjah International Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel.
column3: Sheikh Rashed Bin Humid, Ajman , United Arab Emirates

Just a 10-minute drive from the Dubai International Airport. This 4-star hotel offers a rooftop pool, a fitness centre and 2 restaurants. It has spacious suites including a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Air-conditioned rooms at the TIME Grand Plaza Hotel features balconies  with panoramic city views in some rooms. The bathrooms include luxury toiletries, a bathrobe, and slippers. Some suites include a separate bedroom and a living area with a sofa.

Guests at TIME Grand Plaza Hotel can relax in the mini spa or work out in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. For guests’ convenience, the front desk is open 24 hours a day and can assist with tourist information.

The hotel’s restaurant serves international cuisine and regional dishes. Banquet facilities and room service are also available.

TIME Grand Plaza Hotel is located a 15-minute drive from the Dubai Exhibition and Convention Centre and Al Mamzar Beach. The Dubai Airport Free Zone Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk away.
column3: Near DAFZA, Al Qusais, 237844, Al Qusais, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

sign in
.


Set in Al Rifa residential district, Rolla Residence offers spacious apartments with fully equipped kitchens and a rooftop pool with views of Bur Dubai’s skyscrapers.

The large apartments come equipped with wired internet, flat-screen TVs and air conditioning. All units feature a balcony, and some have a separate living room with sofas and a dining table.

Guests of Rolla Residence Apartment Hotel can sunbathe on the poolside terrace. After a training session at the well-equipped gym, they can relax in the hotel’s sauna.

A large buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at Gossip Café, along with local specialities. A 24-hour room service is provided.

The Rolla Residence is a 5-minute drive from Dubai World Trade Centre and within walking distance from Dubai Museum.
column3: Al Rolla Rd, Bur Dubai, Bur Dubai, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

Grand Millennium Al Wahda the 5-star hotel in Abu Dhabi is located in the heart of the city also offering direct access to Al Wahda Mall. This 5-star hotel offers free WiFi in the lobby bar and rooms with panoramic views over the city. Swim above Abu Dhabi’s skyline in the rooftop swimming pool.

Featuring stylish décor, the spacious rooms include a LCD SMART TV, a private bathroom with bathtub and separate walk in shower.

Indulge with a relaxing massage and beauty treatment at Zayna Spa. Get fit and feel good at Al Wahda health club offering fully equipped cardiovascular and weight equipment with a separate gym for ladies.

Grand Millennium Al Wahda features eight restaurants and bars with a wide range of international cuisines.

In close proximity, the beach front is 7 km, Abu Dhabi City Golf Club is 10 km, Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque is 14 km. Ferrari World Theme Park, Yas Waterworld and Abu Dhabi International Airport are 30 minutes drive. Free private parking is available on site.
column3: Hazza Bin Zayed Street (Defence Street), Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates
